projects.title: Multi Modal Listing (MML)
projects.description: Led development of an AI-enhanced product listing feature in Android using server-based and on-device AI models. Reduced listing time and improved seller acquisition.

projects.title: Android App Modernization at VMware
projects.description: Refactored large Java codebases to Kotlin, introduced Room DB, improved test coverage and CI/CD pipelines, and enforced architectural best practices.

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Android expense tracker written in Kotlin using Clean Architecture, Coroutines, Flows, and Room DB.

projects.title: Plant Disease Detection
projects.description: Android app that uses TensorFlow Lite to detect plant diseases in real-time. The app won 1st place at the 2019 Google Hackathon.

patents.title: Reserving physical resources based upon a physical identifier

certifications_or_extras.education: Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics and Communication, PESIT, VTU
journals_or_publications: Bottom Navigation and Navigation Drawer Using Scaffold from Jetpack Compose

questions.question: Explain your experience with Django and DRF in building backend APIs.
Describe a challenging database optimization you've handled. What strategies did you employ?
How do you implement authentication and authorization in RESTful APIs?
Explain your approach to writing unit and integration tests for backend applications.
Have you worked with Celery or other message queue systems? If so, describe a use case.
Explain the difference between authorization and authentication.
Given a scenario where you need to cache frequently accessed data, how would you implement it using Redis?
How do you approach debugging performance bottlenecks in a Django application?
Describe your experience with CI/CD pipelines in the context of backend deployments.
